function init() print "testttttttt" m.top.setFocus(true) m.video = m.top.findNode("video") m.video = m.top.findNode("video") vidContent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode") vidContent.title = "Test Video" vidContent.streamformat = "mp4" vidContent.url = "https://images-assets.nasa.gov/video/GSFC_20140421_EarthOrbit_m11525/GSFC_20140421_EarthOrbit_m11525~orig.mov" m.video.content = vidContent m.video.control = "prebuffer" print "waiting" m.video.visible = true m.video.setFocus(true) m.video.control = "play"
